mapper.insert: insert into alg_dic (dic_sn, dic_code, dic_key, dic_value, dic_sort, dic_desc, dic_parent_id,dic_relation) values (#{dicSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dicDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dicRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update alg_dic set dic_code = #{dicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_key = #{dicKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_value = #{dicValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_sort = #{dicSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dic_desc = #{dicDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_parent_id = #{dicParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dic_relation = #{dicRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dic_sn = #{dicSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select dic_sn, dic_code, dic_key, dic_value, dic_sort, dic_desc, dic_parent_id, dic_relation from alg_dic
